file.name: nested_recursive_reference_in_file.spec.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Test specification for the translating parser
  version: 0.0.0
paths:
  /hosts:
    get:
      responses:
        default:
          description: >-
            A local reference to a real-world like object with a recursive local reference deep in a structure in a
            referenced file
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Response'
components:
  schemas:
    Response:
      type: object
      properties:
        results:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ResultsItem"
    ResultsItem:
      type: object
      properties:
        contents:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ReferenceObject"
    ReferenceObject:
      $ref: "nested_recursive_reference_in_file_schemas.spec.yaml#/$defs/ComplexObject"

Error: parse: paths: /hosts: get: : responses: default: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Response": parse schema: results: parse schema: item: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/ResultsItem": parse schema: contents: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/ReferenceObject": parse schema: reference "nested_recursive_reference_in_file_schemas.spec.yaml#/$defs/ComplexObject": resolve reference "nested_recursive_reference_in_file_schemas.spec.yaml#/$defs/ComplexObject": invalid schema reference "nested_recursive_reference_in_file_schemas.spec.yaml#/$defs/ComplexObject"
